elements.caption: The name of the remote control
If the status variables are to be updated automatically, please enter an interval in seconds (0 = no update).

actions.caption: The remote control must be registered once on the TV. To do this, please switch on the TV set and call 'Start registration'. After the start, a code will be displayed on the TV.
The displayed code has to be entered under TV code in a timely manner. Afterwards please complete the registration with 'Send login code'.
With 'Update status variables', the variables can be updated once regardless of the set interval.
With 'Update application list' the installed apps are read in again.
With 'Create file with API information' a support file is created in the IP-Symcon log directory. It contains a list of all functions supported by the TV set.
Create file with API information
